1: <pb/><e>Aton jun b'it namami sb'itaji. Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, tan̈vej in val, an̈ej d'ayach tzin col in b'a.</t>
2: <t>Mamin Jehová, sval d'ayach to Vajal ach. Masanil vach'il ay d'ayin, a d'ayach scoti.</t>
3: <t>Te vach' yic eb' tzach c'anab'ajan d'a scal eb' a chon̈ab'. In gana tzin aj d'a scal eb'.</t>
4: <t>Ol te q'uib'chaan̈ syaelal eb' sb'atcan d'a spatic junoc comon dios. Max vac'ochlaj in b'a vac'an schiq'uil noc' silab' yed' eb' d'a scomon dios chi'. Max val-laj in b'a d'a sdiosal eb' chi'.</t>
5: <t>Mamin Jehová, an̈ej d'ayach svic' masanil vach'il. A achton tzac' masanil tas snib'ej in c'ool. D'a yol a c'ab' ayec' in q'uinal.</t>
6: <t>A val b'aj ix echtejcan in macb'en, yelxo te vach'. Man̈xo jantacoc svach'il tas ix ac'can chi' d'ayin.</t>
7: <t>Mamin Jehová, sval vach' lolonel d'ayach yujto a ach tzac' in razón, tza c'ayb'an pax in pensar d'ac'valil.</t>
8: <t>Masanil tiempo naan achn̈ej vuuj. Yujto ayachn̈ej ec' ved'oc, yuj chi' malaj tas tzin ic'ani.</t>
9: <t>Yuj chi' ste tzalaj in c'ool tzin b'itani. Malaj tas tzin na'a, yujto tzach vac'och yipoc in c'ool.</t>
10: <t>Man̈ ol in actejcanlaj d'a scal eb' chamnac, man̈ ol a cha c'ab'at in nivanil tic, a in c'anab'ajum in tic d'ayach.</t>
11: <t>Tzac' vojtaquejel sb'eal q'uinal, tzac'an tzalajb'oc in c'ool ayic ayinec' ed'oc. Ayn̈ej tzalajc'olal d'a a tz'ey d'a masanil q'uinal.</t>
